titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 3019) making appropriations for fiscal year 1996 to make a further downpayment toward a balanced budget, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-538, by Mr. Solomon.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 3019. The resolution waives all points of order against the conference report on the bill and against its consideration.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 211.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/25/1996--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 3019 (omnibus appropriations).
